name: Ronin's Last Stand
description:
The final stand against an insurmountable army.

Press Z to strike.

Made in 9 hours for Triple Trijam 2020, theme "Negative Feedback Loop."

The first build can be accessed here: https://thewanderingshadow.itch.io/ronins-last-stand-build1?secret=Fk2jkbOpndtUt...

Sounds Used:

Wood Snap by duncanlewismackinnon (CC by 3.0):  https://freesound.org/people/duncanlewismackinnon/sounds/159332/

Koto Loop by zagi2 (CC by 3.0): https://freesound.org/people/zagi2/sounds/222551/

Samurai Slash by nekoninja: https://freesound.org/people/nekoninja/sounds/370204/
